attributes.action: Review the way CSA is calculated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have 2 children, 1 lives with me and the other lives with the mum. The mum now has 2 more children by her new partner. Neither of them work, both claim all the benefits. I have worked all my life, yet because she has more kids by someone else and claims, I have to pay CSA, yet she doesn't have to pay a penny. Surely if we have a child each to raise then that evens things out? I have emailed & written to my Councillor & MP, who have both recited "the Law" and there's nothing I can do!!
The benefits they are paid are reduced because I pay CSA, so in effect, I'm "keeping" my ex-partner and her man in a life of luxury.
Tell me again, why we bother to go to work???

THIS IS TOTALLY UNFAIR, DISCRIMINATIVE AND WRONG!

The Law should be fair & equal, not a dictatorship.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
